      • tryLoadSettings

        public static boolean tryLoadSettings(boolean showDialog)
        Tries to load the settings file
        Parameters:
        showDialog - if true, a new the settings window will be showed if no settings found
        Returns:
        true if settings could be loaded, otherwise false

      • saveSettings

        public boolean saveSettings()
        Saves the settings of the current instance
        Returns:
        true if file could be created, otherwise false

        Parameters:
